Skateboarding...

has been around since as early as the 1940s, but hasn't always been as popular as it is today. It is so popular now that you can see it showcased in ways that aren't even directly related to skateboarding, like high fashion magazines using skateboards as props. This spike in popularity didn't begin until the 1980s when skateboarders started running the show..
